metadata.title: CVE-2019-19037 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: ext4_empty_dir in fs/ext4/namei.c in the Linux kernel through 5.3.12 allowsa NULL pointer dereference because ext4_read_dirblock(inode,0,DIRENT_HTREE)can be zero.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
